subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Trevon Bluiett had 15 points and 13 rebounds, and No. 6 Xavier (20-2, 8-2 Big East) overcame poor shooting to beat visiting St. John’s, 90-83. St. John’s (7-16, 0-10) lost its 13th straight.
snippet: Trevon Bluiett had 15 points and 13 rebounds, and No. 6 Xavier (20-2, 8-2 Big East) overcame poor shooting to beat visiting St. John’s, 90-83. St. John’s (7-16, 0-10) lost its 13th straight.
